com.cqblueprints.testing.cq.pageobjects

Interface SiteAdminPage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteAdminPage60

    public interface SiteAdminPage
    Provides helper methods to perform actions on the site admin page
    Author:
    Diran Samarjian
